content.rendered:
Directed by Soubin Shahir.

Written by Muneer Ali. Soubin Shahir. Soubin Shahir.

Cast Amal Shah(Irshad aka Ichappi). Govind V. Pai(Haseeb). Dulquer Salmaan(Imran (Extended Cameo)). Shane Nigam(Shane (as Shane Nigaam)).Siddique. Arjun Ashokan(Hakeem).Jacob Gregory.Sinil Sainuddin.Soubin Shahir.Sreenath Bhasi . Aashiq Abu(Police Officer).Harisree Ashokan.Shine Tom Chacko.Jaffer Idukki.Indrans.Anagha L.K..Aiden Paul.Len Prasad.Unnimaya Prasad. Abhiram Radhakrishnan(Manaf). Shravan Satya(Soubin’s Dance team member). Srindaa(Habeeba (as Srinda Ashab)). Sunitha(Umma)

Language Malayalam.

Producers A.R. Ansar. Anwar Rasheed. Shyju Unni.

Production Anwar Rasheed Entertainment. The Movie Club.
